caption.p: NRK-52E-derived MVs are labeled with orange fluorescent dye and incubated with cardiomyocytes. Microscopy image shows the internalization of fluorescently labeled MVs into cardiomyocytes. Donor NRK-52E cells were labeled with Dil-C18 (red). Control (A), cardiomyocytes incubated with MVs for 6 h (B), 12 h (C) and 24 h (D). ×400.
